SELECT `order`.order_no, `order`.payment_date, user.id, `order`.payment_price, COUNT(*) as total_amount, `order`.order_status FROM `order` JOIN user ON `order`.user_no = user.user_no JOIN order_detail ON `order`.order_no = order_detail.order_no JOIN item ON order_detail.item_no = item.item_no
GROUP BY `order`.order_no
LIMIT #{startIdx}, 20

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(`order`.order_no)) FROM `order` JOIN user ON `order`.user_no = user.user_no JOIN order_detail ON `order`.order_no = order_detail.order_no JOIN item ON order_detail.item_no = item.item_no

SELECT user.id as user_id, item.item_img, item.name as item_name, order_detail.price, order_detail.cancel_status, (SELECT sum(price) FROM order_detail WHERE order_no=order_detail.order_no) total_item_price FROM order_detail JOIN user ON order_detail.user_no = user.user_no JOIN item ON order_detail.item_no = item.item_no WHERE order_detail.order_no = #{order_no};
